hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SINGLE_USE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Percentage of jobs that should be Single Use mesos agent.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AGENT_LABEL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Job runs restricted to this label.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: JOBCOUNT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The number of jobs to create and manage.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EVERY_XMIN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Every X minutes run this job.
